ca.coffeeshopstudio.icegl.gl

Class GLObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.coffeeshopstudio.icegl.gl.GLObject

  • public class GLObject
extends java.lang.Object
    base object for anything that gets drawn to the screen as part of the framework

    • Method Detail

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(float textureU,
              float textureV)
        Set where we start grabbing from the texture
        Parameters:
        textureU - where to horizontally start drawing from in the atlas
        textureV - where to vertically start drawing from in the atlas

      • setTextureOffset

        public void setTextureOffset(float textureUOffset,
                    float textureVOffset)
        What percentage, between 0 and 1, we will use of the texture
        Parameters:
        textureUOffset - width of the section to draw from
        textureVOffset - height of the section to draw from

      • getCloneCount

        protected int getCloneCount()
        When overridden, the object may in fact be several cloned objects. this returns the count of the clones
        Returns:
        how many clones of the object we are drawing. Usually this should return 1

      • setTranslation

        public void setTranslation(float deltaX,
                  float deltaY)
        Adjust the position where we begin drawing the object on the screen
        Parameters:
        deltaX - how far to adjust on the horizontal axis
        deltaY - how far to adjust on the vertical axis
